short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Counts the number of positive bids/preferences when on the HotCRP Bidding Preferences page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After bidding on ICSE 2024 with like a million papers, I got tired of counting my bids manually.  

This very simple extension keeps an always visible running count of your positive bids and can show a table of how many bids at each preference level.  Should work for any HotCRP instance.
